spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S00_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the S_AXI data bus.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S00_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the S_AXI addr bus.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: USE_EXT_TRIG
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Use input trig instead of generate one.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: DFLT_PERIOD
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Default pulse period in clk cycle

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: DFLT_DUTY
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Default pulse duty in clk cycle

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: GEN_SIZE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Size of accumulator used for pulse generation.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: NB_SAMPLE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: number of sample propagates after pulse rise.
